description: Firewall log gives insight to network access changes and may reduce the time it takes to detect suspicious activity. It should be activated.
fix:
activate firewall log

	you can use this script to automate activation:

	#!/bin/bash
	#Variables
	project_id=$1

	gcloud config set project $project_id

	gcloud compute firewall-rules list --format='value(name)'  > rules.txt
	while read rule
	do

	echo '**** $rule ****'

	gcloud compute firewall-rules update $rule --enable-logging

	done <rules.txt
	rm rules.txt
